name: simple-websockets-chat-app
description: This is the code and template for the simple-websocket-chat-app.  There are three functions contained within the directories and a SAM template that wires them up to a DynamoDB table and provides the minimal set of permissions needed to run the app:

scripts.installaws: docker-compose run aws-sam && docker-compose run aws-cli
scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && babel ./src --out-dir dist/ --copy-files && npm run compile-modules
scripts.package: npm run build && docker-compose run aws-sam-package
scripts.deploy: npm run package && docker-compose run aws-sam-deploy
scripts.update: npm run package && docker-compose run aws-sam-update
